name: Aramon Arena
desc: Perfect for porcupining in the fortresses at either end, lots of bottlenecks.

name: Concordant Crossroads
desc: Stacks of metal, a pretty Veruna tileset. Block the paths with wreckage, then go for hovercraft?

name: Crosspaths
desc: A massive metal map with unusual metal textures.

name: Hairy Bogan
desc: Sunshine, sand, swampy shallow water. A bit like Queensland really, hence the name.

name: Sharktopus
desc: An enormous metal map with islands separated with shallow water. Thanks to Venom for the name.
